text: Phir Shaytan ne unko behkaya taa-ke unki sharmgaahein jo ek dusre se chupayi gayi thin unke saamne khol de. Usne unse kaha, â€œtumhare Rubb ne tumhein jo is darakh se roka hai iski wajah iske siwa kuch nahin hai ke kahin tum Farishtey na ban jao, ya tumhein hameshgi ki zindagi hasil na ho jaye
